item.title: What a Federal Ban on THC-Infused Drinks and Snacks Could Mean For the Hemp Industry
item.description: The hemp industry is worth $24 billion in a market where alcohol sales are plummeting.

item.title: The World’s Best New Bourbon Has Been Crowned, and It’s Fairly Priced
3 Ways to Establish Trust Before You Negotiate
item.description: The more time you take to establish trust, the easier, smoother, and better your negotiations will go.

item.title: 6 Steps to Integrate AI and Automation Into Your Business Right Now
item.description: Founders who learn to work with AI and not against it will define the next decade of business.

item.title: Your Workers Probably Distrust AI More Than You Do, This Study Says
item.description: Overuse of AI can be risky, and your workers and best job candidates really want there to be a human in the loop.
